data.eml:eml: Herbiphantes Tanasevitch, 1992 and Labullinyphia van Helsdingen, 1985 (Araneae Linyphiidae), two newly recorded spider genera from the Gaoligong Mountains in China with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Irfan, Muhammad, Peng, Xianjin (2019): Herbiphantes Tanasevitch, 1992 and Labullinyphia van Helsdingen, 1985 (Araneae Linyphiidae), two newly recorded spider genera from the Gaoligong Mountains in China with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 4638 (4): 547-561, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.4.5
